Under VE-SDK-1.0.2 all seems ok. I have installed Eclipse new, but the same effect.
need to fix for VE 1.1 stable build

A normal expression ref should have a normal expression parser, and an event
expression ref should have an event expression parser. The problem was that an
event expression ref was using a normal expression parser to figure out its
location.

This was happening becuase the method which created the expression parser
recently had its signature changed (defect 82101), and that change was not
reflected in the extending event expression ref. Because of this, the extending
event expression ref was creating a normal expression parser - and hence the
class cast exception.

Releasing class CodeEventRef to resolve the problem.
